jobDescription:
Are you ready to take control of your income and professional development?
Kin Group is seeking motivated individuals with a passion for personal growth and financial literacy. Join our team as a full-time financial advisor and reap the benefits of self-employment with secure support.
As a financial services consultant, you will receive great mentorship, have opportunities for personal development, and be part of a fun and supportive working environment. Flexible working hours allow you to balance your personal and professional life.
With a potential income of $2,000 to $8,400 per month and additional benefits like extra leave and professional development opportunities, this is an opportunity you won't want to miss.
To make your job easier, we provide PDPA approved prospecting leads as a resource for our consultants. This ensures that you have a steady stream of potential clients, and you can focus on what you do best – providing financial advice and building relationships.
Requirements

 Minimum full certification in GCA "A" Level (3 Passes in H2 subjects & 2 Passes in H1 subjects), or
 International Baccalaureate Diploma Qualification, or
 Diploma awarded by a Polytechnic in Singapore or equivalent.
 Age 21 & above

Kin Group is an authorised representative of AIA Financial Advisers Private Limited (Reg. No. 201715016G)
Don't miss this chance to start your new career with us.
Apply now and become a part of the Kin Group family.
Job Types: Full-time, Permanent, Fresh graduate, Student job
Salary: $2,000.00 - $8,400.00 per month
Benefits:

 Additional leave
 Flexible schedule
 Professional development
 Work from home

Schedule:

 Flexible hours

Supplemental pay types:

 Commission pay
 Performance bonus

Education:

 Local Polytechnic Diploma (Preferred)

Expected Start Date: 01/04/2023

Job description
This is an exciting chance to help run a fun and rewarding business. F45 is all about the membership and the community and you could be at its forefront.
We are looking for an energetic, motivating, knowledgeable, charismatic trainer to fulfil the role Studio Manager. The Manager is an autonomous role which includes coaching classes, delivering the F45 experience to the community, managing enquiries, looking after our members with amazing customer service, growing our membership base and managing a team of trainers. The individual should have a passion for health and fitness and the F45 brand, a wealth of knowledge, great verbal communication skills, with a willingness to grow and foster a thriving team of trainers, as well as our community.
Responsibilities:

 Develop and foster a positive, community-based team training environment
 Manage a team of trainers including weekly scheduling of training hours
 Ensure all trainers (full and part time) are proficient in all areas of F45 Athletics
 Collaborate with and report to Management team to discuss daily, weekly, and monthly studio sales goals
 Managing a clean, organised, energetic, fun studio
 Look after our Members with excellent customer service
 Deliver High Intensity Interval F45 Group Training classes
 Ensure that all members are getting attention during class, performing exercises safely and correctly while keeping them motivated and encouraged
 Organise and run the F45 Challenge
 Maintain and monitor equipment, advising Management if something needs to be repaired or replaced

Requirements:

 Passion, enthusiasm and genuine motivation for health, fitness and to improve the lives of others
 ACSM or ACE Personal Training Qualification or overseas equivalent
 Current First Aid and CPR certificate
 Minimum of 3 years of experience in the fitness industry, experience in management roles are a bonus
 Sales experience is a bonus
 Proficiency in all areas of Mindbody is a bonus
 Proficiency in all areas of Loyalsnap is a bonus
 Ability to engage and develop strong relationships with clients
 Good communication and ability to educate others
 Happy, positive, enthusiastic and friendly personality

Culture & Benefits

 Commitment to work life balance through a flexible schedule
 Potential to work 25% from home
 Training provided on F45 product and technology
 Small, motivated team to work with and great support network within the F45 Group
 Salary $2.5K-$4K based on experience including performance related incentives and CPF.

Job Types: Full-time, Permanent
Salary: $2,500.00 - $4,000.00 per month
Benefits:

 Employee discount
 Flexible schedule
 Gym membership
 Professional development
 Work from home

Schedule:

 Flexible hours

Supplemental pay types:

 Performance bonus

COVID-19 considerations:
All staff must be fully vaccinated. Trainers must adhere to the Sports SG issued guidance
Expected Start Date: 01/03/2023

jobTitle: Software Engineering Lead Trainer (Singapore time zone)
jobDescription:
About the Institute of Data
The Institute of Data is a Professional Network of Data Scientists, Cyber Security Analysts and Software Engineering. In partnership with leading universities in Australia, New Zealand & America, the government of Singapore and hundreds of employers, we transform careers for a data-driven world.
About the role
We are looking for Lead Trainers to lead this transformative experience in 2023. These opportunities are full time (Monday to Friday 9am-1pm)or part time (outside normal business hours during evenings & weekends). The work is at remote in Singapore time zone. Applicants must be a citizen or resident of Singapore, Australia, New Zealand or United States.
The current opportunity start on 27th March and run for either 3 or 6 months.Further opportunities available in 2023.
The course you will be teaching includes front-end development approaches (HTML, CSS, JavaScript), frameworks used to design and create interactive websites, RESTful API design, database design and the basics of full-stack development and deployment. Assessment is in the form of labs and project work. Students graduating from the course should be well equipped to take on junior software professional roles effective in web development and related functions.

 Deliver and coordinate teaching, student direction and career opportunities
 Provide students with meaningful and prompt feedback on their progress
 Collaborate alongside staff in order to best meet the needs and learning styles of your students
 Guide students through the development of real world projects that will showcase their abilities to hiring managers
 Facilitate a dynamic and collaborative classroom community
 Inspire students to persevere through the challenges of learning complex subjects.

About you

 Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering or related discipline
 Minimum of 5 years commercial experience as a software developer, preferably with exposure to full-stack development for web and mobile
 Subject matter expertise in JavaScript and related libraries for web development such as React, Bootstrap, Vue, Node, Express
 Experience in Database design including extensive knowledge of SQL and Postgres
 Excellent written & verbal communication skills including the ability to express technical material in an accessible way

Culture & Benefits

 Contract opportunities throughout the year
 Make a life-changing impact by doing what you know and love
 Join our leading global industry network and be connected to some of the top employers & clients from around the world
 Speaking opportunities at industry events

Job Types: Full-time, Part-time, ContractContract length: 3-6 monthsPart-time hours: 10-20 per week
Salary: $80.00 - $90.00 per hour
Schedule:

 Day shift
 Late shift
 Monday to Friday
 Weekend availability

Application Question(s):

 Are you a citizen or resident in either Singapore, Australia, New Zealand or United States?

Experience:

 Software Engineering: 5 years (Required)

Expected Start Date: 27/03/2023

jobTitle: Writers with Flexible Hours (Including Weekends & PHs)!
jobDescription:
We are looking for writers to join the Goody Feed Family.
Key Requirements:

 Strong command of English (written)
 Loves keeping up with current affairs / recent trends
 Able to work well in a team to come up with unique and creative ideas
 Able to deliver within tight deadlines
 Detailed-oriented
 Organised, independent and capable of working under pressure

So if you think you’re the right fit, send in two writing samples of your own to jobs (at) goodyfeed.com
Working hours (daily, including weekends and public holidays) are flexible and you can choose to mix-and-match between these three different shifts (or even work in two shifts in a day):

 9am to 1pm
 1pm to 5pm
 5pm to 9pm

We regret to inform that only short-listed applicants will be notified.
Goody Feed’s style is unlike other platforms; every article must be both informative (educate readers about something, be it news or important facts) and entertaining (make readers laugh as the news / facts are usually pretty dry).
Here’s an example, whereby we write about the top Google searches in 2020 based on what Google told us, and added jokes to make it entertaining: https://goodyfeed.com/google-trends-jamus-lim/
So please don’t send us your school thesis unless it contains jokes.
Job Types: Full-time, Part-time, Permanent, Contract, Temporary, Freelance, Internship, Fresh graduate, Student jobPart-time hours: 15 per week
Salary: From $300.00 per week
Benefits:

 Flexible schedule
 Promotion to permanent employee
 Work from home

Schedule:

 Flexible hours

Supplemental pay types:

 Commission pay
 Overtime pay
 Performance bonus

Job Description & Requirements
We’re looking for a READY growth hacker who’s able to lead our company’s marketing campaigns and increase growth to the next level. An individual with an analytical, ‘dare to try’ personality and creative marketing mind with proven results
Do you have real love for marketing and keen interest in the Singapore durian industry? We are here to welcome you!
Responsibilities
* Planning new digital marketing ideas/campaigns, including web, SEO/SEM, email, social media, Facebook Instagram, Tik Tok and Google display advertising
* Create and execute new unchartered digital sales channel to bring more sales within new/existing media platforms
* Assist in development of the business’s direction in both Marketing and cross-department aspect
* Work closely with other departments to exponentially boost growth and efficiency
* Maintaining our website and social media presence across all digital channels
* Measuring and reporting on the performance of all digital marketing campaigns
* Creating and executing a strong performance marketing strategy & execution plan
* Managing budgets and campaigns across all digital channels to drive strong return on ads investment
* Ensuring successful planning, execution, optimization for key concepts KPIs via paid, organic & own media channels
* Identifying and testing new opportunities as a whole to continue to meet or exceed expected critical measurements
* Responsible to develop all Internal Graphic Design assets (including new SKU Presentation/Poster/Banner/etc.)
* Handling of content copywriting ideations and execution of all social media platforms, including captions and Email Direct Marketing
* To complete allocated projects by collaborating with other vendors / bloggers / influencers / agencies / other companies
Characteristics
*Creative and analytical, passionate for marketing in general
*Have a keen eye to spot abnormalities and opportunities
*Resourceful with materials available to achieve intended goal
*Dedicated to find way to meet the expected ROAS
*Must be able to work in a fast-paced environment with odd-hours and highly-initiative surrounding especially during peak seasons
*Possess strong work ethic and sense of responsibility to delivery results beyond expectations
Requirements
*Applicants must possess a relevant proven skills / experiences (not looking into learning phrase growth hackers)
*Additional industry certificates such as Meta BluePrints and GAIQ is an additional bonus for consideration
*Applicants are required to have proven experience or results in ROAS of at least 1:5
*Marketing Proficiency in: Marketing Planning, Direct Paid Ads, SSM, SEO, SEM, CRM, Leads Generations and Email Marketing
*Technical Proficiency in: Decent Photoshop and Photography, Web Buildin, WP WooCommerce and Basic IT
Our Shop Office Location: 24A 456 Geylang/ Work From Home
Want to use your marketing ideas and apply your skills to see results in direct ROAS? Look no further, with a dynamic working environment for you to get involved with, you’ll be able to see your marketing concept and technical expertise turned into satisfying results
Job Types: Full-time, Permanent
Salary: $3,800.00 - $4,500.00 per month
Benefits:

 Flexible schedule
 Professional development
 Work from home

Schedule:

 Flexible hours
 Monday to Friday

Supplemental pay types:

 Commission pay
 Performance bonus
 Yearly bonus

Education:

 Local Polytechnic Diploma (Preferred)

Experience:

 Social media management: 2 years (Preferred)
 Local Polytechnic Diploma: 3 years (Preferred)
 Digital marketing: 2 years (Preferred)
 Facebook Advertising: 2 years (Preferred)
 Website management: 2 years (Preferred)
 Analysis skills: 2 years (Preferred)

Introduction
AE Live is looking for someone with a passion for sport to join our graphics operating team to deliver some of the biggest sporting broadcasts around the world, with a focus towards operating our Augmented Reality (AR) graphics. The successful candidate will receive training to develop the necessary skills in order to operate our bespoke software and systems, resulting in them contributing to the television coverage they have grown up watching.
About us
For almost thirty years, AE Live have established themselves globally, delivering live real-time 3D, 4K and AR graphics, touchscreens and data solutions to some of the world’s top broadcasters, production houses and governing bodies.
Our Singapore organisation, based in Media Circle, is supported by regional offices in UK, Australia, India, Malaysia, New Zealand, South Africa and USA employing over 250 full-time staff.
The Role

 Operate AE’s systems to provide live AR and other broadcast graphics to some of the world’s leading broadcasters.
 Travel to the sporting events and client production houses around the World
 Work a varied schedule which includes unsociable hours and weekends
 Rigging equipment on site

The ideal candidate

 Excellent understanding of multiple sports such as football, Badminton, Tennis ..etc
 Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
 Strong command of the English language
 Computer literate
 Organised, punctual and have an exceptional level of concentration
 Able to handle high pressure situations
 Willing to work flexible hours, including weekends

Job Types: Full-time, Permanent, Contract, Internship, Fresh graduate, Student jobContract length: 12 months
Salary: $1,800.00 - $2,300.00 per month
Benefits:

 Additional leave
 Cell phone reimbursement
 Flexible schedule
 Promotion to permanent employee
 Work from home

Schedule:

 Early shift
 Flexible hours
 Weekend availability

Supplemental pay types:

 13th month salary

Shift availability:

 Day Shift (Preferred)
 Night Shift (Preferred)
 Overnight Shift (Preferred)

Willingness to travel:

 50% (Preferred)
